Record.Description: Forms of combined immunodeficiency caused by mutations in the gene for INTERLEUKIN RECEPTOR COMMON GAMMA SUBUNIT. Both severe and non-severe subtypes of the disease have been identified.A form of combined immunodificiency caused by mutations in the gene for INTERLEUKIN RECEPTOR COMMON GAMMA-CHAIN.
